t_scene_info.dialogue: I will now dance for this woman in gold.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I found someone! What's going on in Gensokyo?

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Everybody is enjoying this blessing!

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Others are not. Only I have this hairstyle.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: With all that gold that's on you, I'd love to call you a "big fat witch".

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Oh, for God's sake, you cannot lay an insult on the Queen of the Federal Kingdom of Gensokyo.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You won't mock me, and I'm not overweight, you imbecile.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Oh. I didn't realize you were Queen Marisa.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: From other interpretations, you had shorter hair and wore a black outfit...

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: That's what I used to wear before I became a princess on my 15th birthday. But listen up.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Reimu does not like this. She tried to cut it off but it only grew back within seconds.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: That's what my mother wanted to bless Gensokyo with. Very long hair will be the new essence of beauty!

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I wish I could ram my Master Spark down her throat. She went a little overboard!

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Overboard? Wow, you must be a tough queen.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Yukari may be tough in terms of power, but your mom will pay for ruining Reimu's hair.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Pay? How much?

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: She will be drowned in my danmaku. I will not let her be any more beautiful than me.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You will not meet with her. Even if you get past me, she will just defeat you black and blue.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: How about green, black, and blue like the colors of the sky?

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Are those the colors of your danmaku? Show me what you've got.
